full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/24/2023 2RS PINDIA'S GET NO RUPEES O.RUPEES Affidavit. I, Ranjit Kaur wife of Sh.sohan singh, s/o Sh.Sajjan singh, aged 71 yr resident of H.No.17, Ward No.15, Khanna Dist. Ludhiana (Punjab-India), do hereby solemnly affirm and declare as under:- 1. That I am resident of Khanna, since August,1947 2. That FOIA (b)(6) s/o Late Gurdit singh s/o Suhail singh is the real son of my real sister smt. Mohinder Kaur widow of Gurdit singh. 3. That from my personal knowledge, I know that FOIA (b)(6) and my real sister smt Mohinder Kaur. That on enquiry, I came to know that the birth KHA entry pertaining to the said FOIA (b)(6) CERTIFIED TO BE AT FOIA (b)(6) DEC 9 1985 DATE 5. That the said FOIA (b)(6) is now NAME Salvariz FOIA (b)(6)
